titleStmt.title: Chronologia sacra By the high ... Doctor Phil. Nicolai. lib. 2. de regno Christi. Shortly collected and augmented by Neils Michelsone. Cum priuilegio S. R. Maj. Newly translated out of the Germans and Dence tongue into English, by David Forbes. Pervsed, and accompanied with a short treatise and exhortation tending to repentance
Chronologia sacra. English
titleStmt.author: Nicolai, Philipp, 1556-1608.
Michelsone, Neils, ed. and trans.
Forbes, David, of Edinburgh.
Arthus, Gotthard, b. 1568.

notesStmt.note: An edition of: Nicolai, Philipp. Chronologia sacra.
Translated into German by Gotthard Arthus in 1598, into Danish by Niels Michelsone in 1628, and then into English by David Forbes.--NUC Pre-1956.
Title page mutilated, with some loss of print.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
